name: Golfer get over it with his ba
name_original: Golfer get over it with his ba
description:
You will be just like a hammer man climbing to the highest peak. Get over it obstacles and climb as high as possible! Getting a cool ability and easily go through all the difficulties. Play with us in Golfer get over it with his ball!

Get over it the ball as far as possible, it's like a game of golfing over it, but only you have to climb up in the same way as a hammer man once did. Try to run the ball on the platform higher, it will not be as easy as it might seem. Use all your golfing over it skills, hit the ball and overcome the difficulties on your way. Maybe you will roll down and fall down ... Do not give up! You will pass the same place several times, but to get through them faster, getting special opportunities.
Features:
- A new interpretation of the game hammer man
- Play golfing over it and overcome obstacles
- Rise to new heights
- Getting unusual balls for the game!

Get over it the difficulties over and over again, despite all your downs and disappointments! Climb above, do not stop there! Getting the skills of golfing over it, and climb up, just like a hammer man did!
